word: When you become one with your brethren, as is represented in the seventeenth chapter of John, you may expect the love and power of God to flow in rich currents into your soul. The work of God is not divided; it is one, and if there is any separation between the medical missionary work and the ministry, it will be because the Holy Spirit is not working upon hearts.--Letter 40, 1899, p. 14. (To Dr. J. H. Kellogg, February 23, 1899.)
